uploader.exceedsMaxSize: The file you selected exceeds the {{maxSize}} limit

password.invalid: Password must be at least 8 characters, and at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.message: Take a moment and try again. If the error persist, please contact us.

login.title: Login
login.headline: 👋 Welcome back!
login.subHeadline: Log in to your account or create an account

email.label: Email address
email.required: The email address is not allow to be empty
email.invalid: The email address is not valid

password.label: Password
password.required: The password is not allow to be empty
password.maxLength: The password must be less than 100 characters.

signUp.title: Create an account
signUp.subHeadline: Start a 7-day trial with all features unlocked

name.label: Name
name.required: The name is not allow to be empty

signUp.agreement: By signing up, you agree to our <a1>terms of service</a1> and <a2>privacy policy</a2>.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.subHeadline: We'll send you an email with verification code

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subHeadline: We've sent you an email with a 6-digit verification code, please check your inbox at {{email}}.

verificationCode.label: Verification code
verificationCode.required: The verification code is not allow to be empty

repeatPassword.label: New password
repeatPassword.invalid: The new password and repeat password do not match.

verifyEmail.title: Verify email address
verifyEmail.subHeadline: We've sent you an email with a 6-digit verification code. Please check your inbox at {{email}}.

oauth.title: Authorize
oauth.headline: Connect with {{name}}
oauth.subHeadline: Use {{name}} to integrate HeyForm with your favorite apps, like Chat, Email, or SMS.
scopes: Retrieve data about all the workspaces in your HeyForm account
Retrieve data about all the project in your HeyForm workspace
Retrieve data about all the forms in your HeyForm project

sidebar.noProjects: You can contact the workspace owner to add you to a project, or you can create a new one.

creation.title: Create Workspace
creation.headline: Create a new workspace
creation.subHeadline: Workspaces are shared environments where members can collaborate. After creating a workspace, you can invite others to join.

name.label: Workspace name
name.required: The workspace name is not allow to be empty

invitation.title: Invitation
invitation.headline: You've been invited to join <span1>{{owner}}</span1>'s workspace: <span2>{{name}}</span2>
invitation.subHeadline: Join the workspace and start collaborating today!

trial.title: Start your 7-day free trial
trial.subHeadline: No contracts, downgrade or cancel the subscription anytime within a single click from your dashboard.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noForms: There are no forms in the workspace
dashboard.pickTemplate: Simply pick a template or start from scratch.

remove.title: Remove
remove.headline: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this workspace?
remove.subHeadline: Once you confirm, the member will no longer have access to this workspace's data.

transfer.title: Transfer ownership
transfer.headline: Are you sure you want to transfer this workspace to {{name}}?
transfer.subHeadline: Once you confirm the transfer, you will no longer be the owner of this workspace.

leave.title: Leave workspace
leave.headline: Are you sure you want to leave the workspace?
leave.subHeadline: Once you confirm to leave this workspace, you will no longer have access to its data.

invite.title: Invite member
invite.headline: Invite members
invite.subHeadline: Invite your teammates to join the workspace via email. The invitation is valid for 7 days.
invite.required: The email address is not allow to be empty
invite.sentSuccessMessage: Invited members have been notified with email to sign up for HeyForm

plans.headline: Plans
plans.subHeadline: Workspace {{workspaceName}} is currently on the {{planName}} plan.

subscription.headline: Current plan
subscription.subHeadline: Workspace is currently on the {{planName}} plan.

invoices.headline: Invoices
invoices.subHeadline: Visit the <button>Stripe customer portal</button> to view your invoices.

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.headline: Upgrade your plan
upgrade.subHeadline: You've reached the limit of your current plan or are trying to access an advanced feature. Please upgrade to unlock it.
upgrade.removeBranding: Upgrade to Premium to remove HeyForm branding
upgrade.customDomain: Upgrade to Premium to set up custom domain
upgrade.translations: Upgrade to Premium to translate form questions
upgrade.customCSS: Upgrade to Premium to set up custom CSS
upgrade.report: Upgrade to Basic to view the form report
upgrade.customize: Upgrade to Basic to customize the form
upgrade.exportData: Upgrade to Basic to export CSV
upgrade.theme: Upgrade to Basic to set a theme for the form
upgrade.metadata: Upgrade to Basic to set up link settings
upgrade.hiddenFields: Upgrade to Basic to add hidden field

couponCode.label: Coupon code
couponCode.require: The coupon code is not allow to be empty

downgrade.headline: Downgrade plan
downgrade.subHeadline: Once you confirm the downgrade, your workspace: {{workspaceName}} will no longer have access to the features of the {{planName}} plan.

business: No size limit on file upload

branding.title: Branding
branding.name: Name
branding.pickLogo: Pick a logo for your workspace.
branding.removeBrandingSubHeadline: To make HeyForm feel like it's completely owned by your brand, remove the HeyForm Logo in the form footer.

customDomain.headline: Custom domain
customDomain.subHeadline: Custom domains allow you to make form accessible at your own, non-HeyForm domain names. Read more
customDomain.tip1: Custom domains allow you to make forms accessible at your own, non-HeyForm domain names (for example, yourcustomdomain.com). HeyForm supports all top-level domains for custom domains. Read more
customDomain.tip2: Please add the following DNS records to your domain name provider's DNS settings. You can verify your domain's DNS records using this tool: DNS Lookup
customDomain.name: Name
customDomain.proxyTip: To domain name providers such as Cloudflare, we request that you disable the Proxy feature
customDomain.dnsError: We couldn't verify your DNS records. If you set this up already, try again later.

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Get an email with all your forms, settings in one file.
exportData.successTip: Once the export is ready, you will receive an email containing the download link.

deletion.title: Delete workspace
deletion.description: Deleting the workspace will permanently erase all forms and data. Proceed with caution!
deletion.headline: Verify workspace deletion request
deletion.tip1: If you are sure you want to proceed with the deletion of the workspace {{name}}, please continue below.
deletion.tip2: Keep in mind this operation is irreversible and will permanently erase all data linked to this workspace.
deletion.tip3: Once you confirm the deletion of the workspace, you will no longer be able to access the workspace data.

code.label: Enter deletion code sent to {{email}}.
code.required: The verification code is not allow to be empty

forms.title: Forms
forms.headline: There are no forms in the project

trash.title: Trash
trash.headline: There are no forms in the trash
trash.subHeadline: Forms will be permanently deleted from the trash after 30 days.

delete.headline: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the form: {{name}}?
delete.subHeadline: Once you confirm the deletion of the form, all data related to the form will be permanently removed.

trash.tip: You can restore any form deleted within the last 30 days. Read more

members.title: Members
members.headline: Members in this project
members.subHeadline: Only users who have been added to this project can access its data, including forms and submissions.
members.addSuccess: The member has been successfully added
members.removeSuccess: The member has been successfully removed
members.leaveSuccess: You have successfully left the project
members.leaveFailed: Failed to leave from the project

creation.subHeadline: Projects are subgroups within a workspace, enabling you to add members to collaborate on forms and integrations.

delete.tip2: Keep in mind this operation is irreversible and will permanently erase all data linked to this project.
delete.tip3: Once you confirm the deletion of the project, you will no longer be able to access the project data.

submissions.title: Submissions
submissions.headline: No submissions yet
submissions.subHeadline: Share the form online to reach a wider audience.

mapFields.headline: Map fields
mapFields.subHeadline: Map HeyForm to {{name}} columns. If you change a column on {{name}}, please update it here too, otherwise the integration won't work as expected.
mapFields.requried: The map fields is not allowed to be empty
mapFields.requireLeft: The left side of field {{index}} is not allowed to be empty
mapFields.requireRight: The right side of field {{index}} is not allowed to be empty

authorization.headline: Authorization
authorization.subHeadline: First of all, please authorize HeyForm to access your data.

webhook.label: Endpoint URL
webhook.invalid: The endpoint URL is not valid

telegram.label: Chat ID
telegram.required: The Chat ID is not allow to be empty
telegram.footer: Add @HeyForm_bot to your Telegram group, and type /start@HeyForm_bot in the group. You will then receive a message with a Chat ID.

legacyslack.label: Webhook URL
legacyslack.invalid: The webhook URL is not valid
legacyslack.footer: Create your <a1>Slack app</a1>, enable <a2>Incoming Webhooks</a2>, and then paste the Webhook URL here.

lark.label: Webhook URL
lark.invalid: The webhook URL is not valid
lark.footer: Add a Custom bot in your group, and then paste Webhook URL here.

email.label: Email address
email.invalid: The email address is not valid

facebookpixel.label: Pixel ID
facebookpixel.required: The Pixel ID is not allow to be empty
facebookpixel.footer: Copy and paste your Facebook Pixel ID here. How do I find my Pixel ID?

googleanalytics.label: Tracking Code
googleanalytics.required: The tracking code is not allow to be empty
googleanalytics.footer: Copy and paste your Google Analytics tracking code below. How do I find my tracking code?

drive.headline: Select a drive
drive.footer: You can select your own Google Drive or Google shared drives you are connected to.

folder.headline: Select a folder
folder.footer: You can select a folder to place the files uploaded from your HeyForm.

serverURL.headline: Server URL
serverURL.footer: The server URL is the URL you access the frontend of the system with. e.g. https://support.domain.com.

apiKey.headline: API Key
apiKey.footer: Generate an API token by going to Manage -> API keys in the admin panel, making sure it has create ticket permission.

systemURL.headline: System URL
systemURL.subHeadline: The server URL is the URL you access the frontend of the system with. e.g. https://support.domain.com.

token.headline: API Token
token.subHeadline: Generate an API token by going to Settings -> General -> API Tokens in the operator panel, making sure it has Read & Write access.

share.title: Share
share.unpublishedTip: This form has unpublished changes. Please publish the latest version before sharing the form.

qrcode.title: Share via QR Code
qrcode.headline: Embed form
qrcode.subHeadline: Here are some options to integrate your form into your website.

email.title: Share via email
email.subject: Cold you take a moment to fill in this heyform?
email.body: We would really appreciate it if you filled in this form: {{url}}. Thank you.

settings.headline: Link settings
settings.subHeadline: Set how your form appears when you share the link on social media.
settings.title: Title

preview.headline: Preview
preview.subHeadline: HeyForm automatically generates an Open Graph image for you. You can also .
preview.uploadTitle: Upload your own Open Graph image

embed.title: Embed
embed.headline: Embed form
embed.subHeadline: Here are some options to integrate your form into your website.

code.headline: Add HeyForm to your website
code.subHeadline: Paste the following code snippet in the body section of your website.

archive.headline: Submission archive
archive.subHeadline: Turn off the submission archive if you prefer HeyForm not to save your submissions.

redirect.headline: Redirect on completion
redirect.subHeadline: Redirect to a custom URL when the form is submitted.
redirect.placeholder: Enter the redirect URL here, e.g., https://example.com
redirect.invalidUrl: The redirect URL is not valid

progressBar.headline: Progress bar
progressBar.subHeadline: You can easily let respondents know how close they are to completing your form.

viewQuestions.headline: View all questions
viewQuestions.subHeadline: You can enable it to allow respondents to go through all the questions.

navigationArrows.headline: Navigation arrows
navigationArrows.subHeadline: You can enable it to let respondents navigate between questions.

closeForm.headline: Close form
closeForm.subHeadline: You can close this form to stop receiving new submissions and prevent public access to the form.

scheduledDate.headline: Close form on a scheduled date
scheduledDate.subHeadline: When you want to receiving submissions within a certain date range, you can set the start and end dates here.

countdown.headline: Countdown
countdown.subHeadline: You can set an allowable time here if you want to block the submission after the countdown is over.

limitIP.headline: Limit the frequency of submitting for same IP address
limitIP.subHeadline: You can set it here if you want to limit the number of submitting times from a same IP address in a period.

quotaLimit.headline: Limit the number of submissions
quotaLimit.subHeadline: This allows you to set a specific total number of submissions allowed for your form.
quotaLimit.invalid: The number of submissions is not valid

closedMessage.headline: Closed form message
closedMessage.subHeadline: This is what the recipients will see if you closed the form with one of the options above.
closedMessage.title: Title of closed message

primaryLanguage.headline: Primary language
primaryLanguage.subHeadline: Select the primary language in which respondents will see your form. Applies to non-customized text, such as default buttons, validation errors, etc.

translations.headline: Translations
translations.subHeadline: Automatically translate the form's questions into your chosen languages using OpenAI ChatGPT.

self.headline: Self email notifications
self.subHeadline: Get an email when someone completes this form.

respondent.headline: Respondent email notifications
respondent.subHeadline: Send a customized text email to respondents after form submission.

password.headline: Password protection
password.subHeadline: Secure your form with a single, easy-to-remember password.

bot.headline: Bots prevention
bot.subHeadline: Prevent bot submissions by enabling the captcha.

antiSpam.headline: Anti-spam
antiSpam.subHeadline: You can enable it to prevent spam submissions.

sidebar.addEndingTip: Add a new ending. You can create multiple endings and implement logic to determine which one people will see.

questionType.headline: Change question type?
questionType.subHeadline:
Different question types have varying data structures for their answers. Switching between them may result in some responses being lost. 
Please export your responses before proceeding.

payment.title: Payment
payment.headline: Connect with stripe
payment.subHeadline:
Collect and receive payments directly on your bank account provided by Stripe.
Free HeyForm users collect payments at the the rate of 5% HeyForm commission + Stripe transaction fee.
To remove the 5% HeyForm commission on payments, upgrade to .

theme.title: Theme
theme.success: The theme has been successfully updated.

hiddenFields.headline: Hidden fields
hiddenFields.subHeadline: Hidden fields enable you to track subjects under investigation. They remain invisible to anyone filling out the form, yet allow for the efficient collection and utilization of data.
hiddenFields.emptyState: Hidden field allows invisible efficient data collection. Read more
hiddenFields.name: Name

variable.headline: Variables
variable.subHeadline: A form variable represents a hidden calculated value based on the responses from your respondents in your form. For example, it can be used to calculate the score of a quiz.
variable.emptyState: Variable calculates hidden values from responses. Read more
variable.name: Name

rule.headline: Rules

bulkEdit.headline: Bulk edit
bulkEdit.subHeadline: Bulk edit the logic of multiple questions at once.

rule.emptyState: Logic enables forms to react to responses. Read more
rule.required: The logic rule is not allow to be empty

suspend.headline: The form has been suspended
suspend.subHeadline: If you have questions about suspension, click the button below to contact us.

user.headline: Account settings
user.subHeadline: Changes to account settings will apply to all of your workspaces.

avatar.headline: Avatar
avatar.subHeadline: Gravatar is used by default as your HeyForm avatar, you can upload your custom avatar here.

user.name: Your name

email.headline: Email address
email.subHeadline: We will send you an email with a 6-digit verification code.
email.label: Email address
email.invalid: The email address is not valid

code.label: Enter code sent to {{email}}.
code.required: The verification code is not allow to be empty

password.headline: Password
password.subHeadline: We will send you an email with a 6-digit verification code.

deletion.headline: Delete account
deletion.subHeadline: This will permanently delete your entire account. All your forms, submissions and workspaces will be deleted.
deletion.tip:
This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your entire account. All workspaces you created will be deleted, and you will be removed from all shared workspaces. 
If you are sure you want to proceed with the deletion of your account, please continue below.

code.label: Enter deletion code sent to {{email}}.
code.required: The verification code is not allow to be empty

scheduled.title: Your account has been scheduled for deletion
scheduled.description:
All of your account data, including but not limited to workspaces, projects, forms, and submissions, will be permanently deleted within {{remainingTime}} hours of the deletion request. 
If this was done in error, you can cancel the deletion of your account below.
